title: Israel's energy minister Karine Elharrar left out of COP26 for inaccessibility
content:
1. Israel's energy minister Karine Elharrar left out of COP26 for inaccessibility  NPR
  2. COP26: Minister in wheelchair unable to attend summit  BBC News
  3. Wheelchair-bound Israeli minister excluded from Glasgow summit for entire day  The Times of Israel
  4. COP26 Was Inaccessible for Israeli Minister in Wheelchair | World News | US News  U.S. News & World Report
  5. COP26 was inaccessible for Israeli minister in wheelchair  Reuters

localize.title: イスラエルのエネルギー大臣Karine Elharrarが、アクセスの悪さを理由にCOP26の参加を見送る
以色列能源部长Karine Elharrar因交通不便被排除在COP26之外
